note.p: Birth: Frogmore House, Windsor, Berkshire, England (25 June 1900)
Death: Half a mile from Mullaghmore harbour, County Sligo, Ireland (27 August 1979)
Honours: MVO 1920; KCVO 1922; GCVO 1937; DSO 1941; CB 1943; KCB 1945; KG 1946; PC 1947; GCSI 1947; GCIE 1947; GCB 1955;
OM 1965; Viscount Mountbatten of Burma 1946; Earl 1947; Baron Romsey 1947
Obituaries: Biographical Memoirs of Fellows of the Royal Society 1981 vol 27 pp 355-364, plate, by Lord Zuckerman
References: Robert S Anderson, 'Patrick Blackett in India: Military Consultant and Scientific Intervenor, 1947-72. Part One' in NR 1999 vol 53 pp 253-273
